editorialNotes.tagline: A fun way to learn a language
editorialNotes.standard: With its friendly approach and awesome updates, Duolingoâ€™s long been one of our favourite apps for learning another language. Its secret: making the process genuinely fun. Engaging mini-games test your reading, writing and speaking skills, and joining a club (where you can encourage and compete with others) adds a great social element. Bonus: all those languages and games are available for free!
editorialNotes.short: Learn a new language. Join a club, chat with bots and get reminders to practice.

editorialNotes.standard: This brings together all the Toca Life apps, letting your beloved characters from different apps mingle in one beautiful worldâ€“a world that keeps growing with new areas to explore and characters to meet.

editorialNotes.tagline: Cook up a storm in the kitchen
editorialNotes.standard: Foodâ€™s fun for everyone with Toca Bocaâ€™s second go-round in the kitchen. Choose different characters and try to please their palates by preparing fish, fruit, vegetables, and more. Deciding what to serve and whether to bake, boil, fry, chop, puree, or season itâ€”or all of the aboveâ€”will keep young chefs happily cooking away.
